import Link from "next/link"; import Head from "next/head"; import OptionTop from "../../components/OptionTop" import OptionBottom from "../../components/OptionBottom" import styles from "../styles/languages.module.scss" function Languages(props: any) { /** * in admin the test id is selected, ( props.testid? ) * from selected lang: * link to href="/client/test?testid=[$testid]&lang=[$lang]" */ return (
); } export default Languages;
